img_summary: The image shows a third-person perspective of a character in a dark, rocky environment with red tones and scattered straw on the ground. The character is holding a staff-like weapon and has a detailed outfit with armor pieces and animal fur. A glowing green object is visible in the distance, possibly a collectible or point of interest. The user interface displays ability icons on the left and right sides, along with a health and stamina bar at the bottom left.
